bike.description: A1 Premium Aluminum Race frame, Monocoque "Hemi" top tube, Manipulated 44mm down tube, 44mm Head tube, 1pc triple void extruded chain-stay/BB yoke, Forged/relieved drop-outs w/ integrated axle leading chain tensioning system

components.description: Specialized 100% 4130 Cr-Mo, 1-1/8" reinforced steer, 1-1/4" blades, and 6mm drops w/ 25mm O.D. fork adapters
"SX-1", threadless, 1-1/8", Cr-Mo cups
Specialized ,forged alloy, front-load, 50mm reach
Specialized 4130 Cr-Mo 2-piece, 190mm rise x 640mm width x 8 deg. Back sweep x 2 deg. Up sweep
Specialized, Kraton, 140mm
Tektro SBB-92, linear pull, cold forged, 60mm pads, stainless pipe & hardware
Tektro 313A, linear pull, cold forged
Shimano SFMX-30,1/2" x 3/32", 16t, chrome plated
KMC Z30, 1/2" x 3/32", nickel plated, 88 links
Specialized Oversized 3 piece, hollow tig welded tubular Cr-Mo arms, 180mm,
6mm x 1/2" x 3/32" x 44T Alloy CNC'd 3D "5 spoke" C'ring w/CNC center/drive hole and teeth
Specialized Heat treated hollow 22mm 48splined Cr-Mo spindle, sealed cartridge bearing, Alloy cups and machined spacers
Specialized alloy platforms sealed cartidge bearing O/S Cr-Mo spindle with screw in pins
Alex DM-24, CNC'd side wall braking surface, double wall alloy w/ eyelets, 32h x 13g

Specialized alloy "Flip-Flop" Right & Left side F/W thread, Sealed cartridge bearing, 32h x 13g, Machined alloy dust caps, 3/8" Cr-Mo axle
13g stainless steel aero blade black dipped w/brass nipples

Specialized racing, w/7mm rails

Specialized alloy fork cap w/washer & spacers, Forged alloy axle carriers and tensioner hardware, chain guard cover, reflectors, owners manual
